The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Saturday

Zucchini Soup with Cashew Cream– vegan /gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (zucchuini, white onion, carrot, celery, red bell pepper, tomato, cashew, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

String Beans with Dill – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 300 g (green beans, tomato, dill, garlic, white onion, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Seeds Crackers Bread – raw / gluten free / 40 g (sun flower seeds, pumpkin seeds, flaxseed, dehydrated tomatoes, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Mango & Vanilla Cake – raw / gluten free /110 g (cashews, mango, nuts, almonds, tahina, vanilla, cocoa butter, unfiltered honey)
